battery_low.name: Battery Low
battery_low.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" battery is at {{{state_of_charge}}}% and may soon require charging.

battery_critical.name: Battery Critical
battery_critical.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" has a critically low battery and will be unable to charge more equipment until plugged into a power source.

battery_temperature_low.name: Battery Temperature Low
battery_temperature_low.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature is currently at {{{temperature_f}}}°F, charge performance may be reduced. To protect your battery, turn off the battery breaker while temperatures are below 32°F.

battery_temperature_critical.name: Battery Freeze
battery_temperature_critical.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature is currently at {{{temperature_f}}}°F. Risk of battery freeze! Disconnect your battery and move it to a warmer space to prevent permanent damage!

battery_charging.name: Battery Charging
battery_charging.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is charging. Battery is at {{{state_of_charge}}}%.

battery_discharging.name: Battery Discharging
battery_discharging.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is discharging. Battery is at {{{state_of_charge}}}%.

iot_connection.title: Internet Error
iot_connection.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is not connected to internet.

iot_subscribe.title: Config Error
iot_subscribe.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is having issues connecting cloud services. Please contact support.

iot_unsubscribe.title: Config Error
iot_unsubscribe.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is having issues connecting cloud services. Please contact support.

iot_publish.title: Config Error
iot_publish.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is having issues connecting cloud services. Please contact support.

system_usage_cpu.title: High CPU Usage
system_usage_cpu.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing high CPU usage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_temperature.title: High Temperature
system_usage_temperature.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing high temperature. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_undervoltage.title: Undervoltage
system_usage_undervoltage.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing low voltage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_low_volt_core.title: Undervoltage
system_usage_low_volt_core.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing low voltage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_memory.title: High Memory Usage
system_usage_memory.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" experiencing high memory usage. Please contact support if the problem persists.

system_usage_disk.title: High Disk Usage
system_usage_disk.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" is running out of disk space. Please contact support.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" battery is not present. It may not be plugged in.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" PDU is not present. It may be off or not be plugged in.

command_error_start_priority_charge.title: Start Priority Charge Failed
command_error_start_priority_charge.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" could not start a priority charge.

command_error_stop_priority_charge.title: Stop Priority Charge Failed
command_error_stop_priority_charge.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" could not stop a priority charge.

command_error_set_schedule.title: Set Grid Charging Schedule Failed
command_error_set_schedule.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" could not setup grid charging schedule.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" inverter is not present. It may not be plugged in or failed

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" GPS is not present. It may not be plugged in or failed.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" temperature sensor is not present. It may not be plugged in or failed.

connection_error.title: Connection Error
connection_error.message: Your ChargeBot "{{{device_id}}}" fans are not present. It may not be plugged in or failed.
